item.title: 欧盟将在美国贸易协议中保护空中客车公司，法拉利将蒙受损失
item.description: 在欧盟即将与美国达成贸易协议之际，其谈判代表正集中精力保护关键产业免受大规模关税的影响，这些关税最快将于 8 月 1 日对该集团的出口产品造成冲击。【原文：As the European Union nears a trade deal with the US, its negotiators are focusing on protecting key industries from massive tariffs set to hit the bloc’s exports as soon as Aug. 1.】

item.title: 钻井停滞不前，美国下调 2025 年原油产量增长预测
item.description: 由于油价波动限制了钻探活动，今年美国国内原油产量的增长速度将比预期更慢。【原文：The US sees domestic crude output growth slowing more than expected this year as choppy oil prices limit drilling activity.】

item.title: 由名人支持的素食皮革初创公司将进军芒尼市场，测试风险胃口
item.description: 本周，一家素食皮革初创公司将进入市政债券市场，这标志着投资者对投机性项目融资信心的一次考验。【原文：A vegan-leather start up is slated to tap the municipal bond market this week, marking a test of investor confidence in speculative project finance.】

item.title: BDLI 称，法德裂痕有可能导致下一代战斗机停产
item.description: 德国航空游说团体表示，法国和德国公司在下一代战斗机控制权问题上出现裂痕，有可能导致该项目失败。【原文：A rift between French and German companies over control of a next-generation fighter jet risks dooming the project, Germany’s aviation lobby said, putting in doubt a marquee program just as the region fortifies its defense capabilities.】

item.title: 美国银行上调 S&P 500 指数目标，看好美国企业的恢复能力
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的策略师上调了对美国股市的展望，理由是面对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统混乱的贸易政策，美国企业有能力维持盈利指导。【原文：Bank of America Corp. strategists boosted their outlook for US equities, citing the Corporate America’s ability to maintain earnings guidance in the face of President Donald Trump’s chaotic trade policies.】

item.title: 俄罗斯以 "不受欢迎 "为由禁止耶鲁大学在该国开展活动
item.description: 俄罗斯当局宣布耶鲁大学为 "不受欢迎 "组织，禁止其在该国开展活动。【原文：Russian authorities declared Yale University to be an “undesirable” organization, banning its activities in the country.】

item.title: 汇丰扩大英国财富管理业务，向千亿英镑资产目标发起冲击
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在加紧推进其英国财富管理业务的增长计划，因为这家欧洲最大的银行正努力将其为本国富裕人士监管的资产增加一倍。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is ramping up growth plans for its UK wealth-management operations as Europe’s largest bank seeks to double the assets it oversees for well-heeled individuals in its home nation.】

item.title: 美联储研究称美国限制移民将在 2025 年重创经济
item.description: 根据达拉斯联邦储备银行的一项研究，特朗普政府限制移民和加大驱逐力度将使美国今年的经济增长率降低近一个百分点。【原文：The Trump administration’s curbs on immigration and ramped-up deportations will lower US economic growth by almost a full percentage point this year, according to a study from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 中佐称日本央行面临通胀风险并有加息空间
item.description: 日本央行前副行长中曾宏（Hiroshi Nakaso）表示，日本央行必须对通胀上行风险保持警惕，并有进一步加息的空间。【原文：The Bank of Japan must be vigilant to upside inflation risks and has room to hike interest rates further, according to former Deputy Governor Hiroshi Nakaso.】

item.title: Tether 在瑞士的一个秘密金库中存放着 80 亿美元的黄金
item.description: Tether Holdings SA 是世界上最大的稳定币发行商，它在瑞士拥有自己的金库，储存着 80 亿美元的黄金，并着眼于扩大这些储备。【原文：Tether Holdings SA, the issuer of the world’s largest stablecoin, has its own vault in Switzerland to hold an $8 billion stockpile of gold, with an eye to growing those stores.】

item.title: Lyft 在波多黎各推出最新的地理扩张计划
item.description: Lyft 公司周二在波多黎各推出了共享汽车服务，这是该公司向北美和欧洲扩张的下一步。【原文：Lyft Inc. on Tuesday launched its rideshare service in Puerto Rico as the next step in an expansion across North America and Europe.】

item.title: 财政部长贝森特将于下周访问日本参加世博会
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特计划下周访问日本，参加 2025 年大阪世博会。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is planning to visit Japan next week for the 2025 World Expo in Osaka, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: NFT 市场连续第五个季度下滑，交易量大幅下降
item.description: 不可兑换代币曾经是加密货币交易商和爱好者的一个新兴领域，但现在似乎已经失去了很大的诱惑力，因为这个曾经炙手可热的领域的交易量已经连续五个季度下降。【原文：Nonfungible tokens, once a burgeoning scene for crypto traders and enthusiasts, seem to have lost much of their allure as trading volumes in the once-hot sector have now declined for the fifth straight quarter.】

item.title: OpenAI 和微软支持新学院将人工智能带入课堂
item.description: OpenAI、微软公司和Anthropic正在与美国最大的教师工会之一合作，建立一个新的培训中心，帮助教育工作者在全国各地的课堂上使用人工智能工具。【原文：OpenAI, Microsoft Corp. and Anthropic are partnering with one of the largest teachers unions in the US to establish a new training center to help educators use artificial intelligence tools in classrooms across the country.】

item.title: 保加利亚如何加入欧元及其意义
item.description: 在保加利亚加入欧盟 18 年后，该集团的财政部长们终于为保加利亚在 2026 年 1 月采用欧元货币扫清了障碍。【原文：Eighteen years after Bulgaria joined the European Union, the bloc’s finance ministers have finally cleared the way for it to adopt the euro currency in January 2026.】

item.title: 津巴布韦希望偿还外债，但未说明偿还时间
item.description: 津巴布韦自 1999 年违约以来一直被国际资本市场拒之门外，它希望其更强大的经济能够帮助其偿还外部债权人的债务，但没有说明何时开始偿还。【原文：Zimbabwe, locked out of international capital markets since defaulting in 1999, expects its stronger economy to help it pay back external creditors, without saying when this would begin.】

item.title: 希腊石油公司与俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司就天然气定价达成和解
item.description: 希腊国有天然气分销商 Depa Commercial SA 与俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）就国际仲裁后的供应定价达成庭外协议。【原文：Greek state gas distributor Depa Commercial SA reached an out-of-court agreement with Russia’s Gazprom PJSC on the pricing of supplies following an international arbitration.】

item.title: Viktor Shvets 谈投资者为何不必过分担心人工智能泡沫
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 冶炼厂事故引发顶级铜矿商 Codelco 的停产计划
item.description: 在全球冶炼业过剩给老旧、高成本工厂带来压力之际，Codelco 公司旗下一家拥有百年历史的铜冶炼厂最近发生的事故引发了关于关闭该厂利弊的争论。【原文：A recent mishap at a century-old copper smelter owned by Codelco is stoking debate over the pros and cons of shutting it down as a global smelting glut puts pressure on old, high-cost plants.】

item.title: 新理事暗示日本央行可能上调物价前景
item.description: 日本央行的一位最新董事会成员暗示，该央行可能在本月上调对通胀的看法，这一结果将使今年再次加息的可能性保持开放。【原文：One of the Bank of Japan’s newest board members alluded to a possible upward revision to the central bank’s inflation view this month, an outcome that would keep open the possibility of another rate increase this year.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示通胀预期回到关税前水平
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周二公布的月度调查数据显示，消费者对未来通胀的预期已恢复到今年年初宣布激进新关税之前的水平。【原文：Consumer expectations for future inflation have settled back to levels last seen at the beginning of the year, prior to the announcement of aggressive new tariffs, according to monthly survey data released Tuesday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 加拿大竞争监管机构深化调查，亚马逊面临审查
item.description: 加拿大竞争监督机构获得了一项法院命令，以帮助其调查亚马逊公司是否滥用其在市场上的零售主导地位。【原文：Canada’s competition watchdog secured a court order to help its investigation into whether Amazon.com Inc. is abusing its dominant retail position in the market.】

item.title: 特朗普称不会延长 8 月 1 日关税期限
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他不会对各国开始支付所谓互惠关税的 8 月 1 日这一新的最后期限提出任何延期。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would not offer any extensions to a new August 1 deadline for nations to begin paying so-called reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 亚马逊 "Prime Day "早些时候的消费额比 2024 年下降了 14
item.description: 据管理着各种产品类别中 50 个品牌的 Momentum Commerce 公司称，亚马逊公司的 Prime Day 销售额在活动开始的前四个小时比去年促销开始时下降了近 14%。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s Prime Day sales fell almost 14% in the first four hours of the event compared with the start of last year’s sale, according to Momentum Commerce, which manages 50 brands in a variety of product categories.】

item.title: 鲁比奥冒名顶替者利用人工智能和信号联系外国官员
item.description: 有人冒充国务卿马可-卢比奥使用人工智能生成的语音技术和一个假冒的 Signal 账户与外国官员和至少一名国会议员联系，这是冒名顶替者模仿美国高级官员的最新案例。【原文：Someone pretending to be Secretary of State Marco Rubio used AI-generated voice technology and a fake Signal account to contact foreign officials and at least one member of Congress, the latest case of impostors mimicking senior US officials.】

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉接待莫迪，希望将印度打造成主要贸易伙伴
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦希望深化与世界上人口最多的国家印度的贸易关系。在他准备周二在巴西利亚接待印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）之际，问题是如何实现这一目标。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva wants to deepen trade ties with India, the world’s most populous nation. The question as he prepares to host Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Brasilia on Tuesday is how to go about it.】

item.title: 足球投资人称 "流氓银行家 "掩盖真相毁了合并案
item.description: 陷入困境的足球俱乐部老板约翰-特斯托（John Textor）和他的支持者们正因合并失败而互相起诉，指控这位美国商人在与受制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁米哈伊尔-弗里德曼（Mikhail Fridman）的关系问题上受到了欺骗。【原文：Embattled football club owner John Textor and his backers are suing each other over a failed merger, with allegations that the American businessman was deceived over connections to sanctioned Russian billionaire Mikhail Fridman.】

item.title: 特朗普放松管制，加拿大矿业巨头寻求美国项目
item.description: 加拿大矿业巨头弗兰克-朱斯特拉（Frank Giustra）正在美国寻找项目，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统削减了繁文缛节，铜和黄金等金属的前景依然光明。【原文：Canadian mining magnate Frank Giustra is scouring for projects in the US as President Donald Trump cuts red tape and the outlook for metals like copper and gold remains bright.】

item.title: 英国石油公司计划暂时维持德国炼油厂原油装置的运行
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）原计划关闭盖尔森基兴炼油厂（德国两家炼油厂中规模较大的一家）的一个原油加工装置，但目前该装置仍将继续运行，因为市场有助于提高该厂的盈利能力。【原文：BP Plc will for now keep running a crude-processing unit that it had planned to close at its Gelsenkirchen refinery — the bigger of its two plants in Germany — as the market contributes to the plant’s profitability.】

item.title: 希望贸易谈判有谈判空间，股市保持稳定
item.description: 美国股市周二开盘持稳，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税警告给人们留下了希望，即他仍对谈判持开放态度。【原文：US equities were steady at the open on Tuesday as President Donald Trump’s latest tariff warnings left room for hope that he was still open to negotiations.】
